li.label: gossip
li.description: NAME just can't keep a secret.

li.label: trustworthy
li.description: NAME is someone you can trust with your innermost thoughts. If you ask them to keep something to themselves, they will.

li.label: manipulative
li.description: NAME is socially manipulative. HECAP doesn't always talk ill of people, but if HE doesn't like someone HE will try to turn the rest of the colony against them.

li.label: peacemaker
li.description: NAME just can't stand other people fighting. HECAP will always try to persuade others to put aside their differences..

li.label: gushing
li.description: NAME doesn't have a particular problem keeping other people's secrets, but can't help oversharing their own.

li.label: compulsive liar
li.description: NAME has a difficult relationship with the truth. This causes difficult relationships with other colonists.
